Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.1: Woe to the pastors, that destroy and tear the sheep of my pasture, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.2: Therefore thus saith the Lord the God of Israel to the pastors that feed my people: You have scattered my flock, and driven them away, and have not visited them: behold I will visit upon you for the evil of your doings, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.3: And I will gather together the remnant of my flock, out of all the lands into which I have cast them out: and I will make them return to their own fields, and they shall increase and be multiplied.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.4: And I will set up pastors over them, and they shall feed them: they shall fear no more, and they shall not be dismayed: and none shall be wanting of their number, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.5: Behold the days come, saith the Lord, and I will raise up to David a just branch: and a king shall reign, and shall be wise, and shall execute judgement and justice in the earth.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.6: In those days shall Juda be saved, and Israel shall dwell confidently: and this is the name that they shall call him: the Lord our just one.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.7: Therefore behold the days to come, saith the Lord, and they shall say no more: The Lord liveth, who brought up the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.8: But the Lord liveth, who hath brought out, and brought hither the seed of the house of Israel from the land of the north, and out of all the lands, to which I had cast them forth: and they shall dwell in their own land.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.9: To the prophets: My heart is broken within me, all my bones tremble: I am become as a drunken man, and as a man full of wine, at the presence of the Lord, and at the presence of his holy words.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.10: Because the land is full of adulterers, because the land hath mourned by reason of cursing, the fields of the desert are dried up: and their course is become evil, and their strength unlike.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.11: For the prophet and the priest are defiled: and in my house I have found their wickedness, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.12: Therefore their way shall be as a slippery way in the dark: for they shall be driven on, and fall therein: for I will bring evils upon them, the year of their visitation, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.13: And I have seen folly in the prophets of Samaria: they prophesied in Baal, and deceived my people Israel.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.14: And I have seen the likeness of adulterers, and the way of lying in the prophets of Jerusalem: and they strengthened the hands of the wicked, that no man should return from his evil doings: they are all become unto me as Sodom, and the inhabitants thereof as Gomorrha.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.15: Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts to the prophets: Behold I will feed them with wormwood, and will give them gall to drink: for from the prophets of Jerusalem corruption has gone forth into all the land.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.16: Thus saith the Lord of hosts: Hearken not to the words of the prophets that prophesy to you, and deceive you: they speak a vision of their own heart, and not out of the mouth of the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.17: They say to them that blaspheme me: The Lord hath said: You shall have peace: and to every one that walketh in the perverseness of his own heart, they have said: No evil shall come upon you.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.18: For who hath stood in the counsel of the Lord, and hath seen and heard his word? Who hath considered his word and heard it?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.19: Behold the whirlwind of the Lord's indignation shall come forth, and a tempest shall break out and come upon the head of the wicked.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.20: The wrath of the Lord shall not return till he execute it, and till he accomplish the thought of his heart: in the latter days you shall understand his counsel.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.21: I did not send prophets, yet they ran: I have not spoken to them, yet they prophesied.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.22: If they stood in my counsel, and had made my words known to my people, I should have turned them from their evil way and from their wicked doings.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.23: Am I, think ye, a God at hand, saith the Lord, and not a God afar off?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.24: Shall a man be hid in secret places, and I not see him, saith the Lord? do not I fill heaven and earth, saith the Lord?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.25: I have heard what the prophets said, that prophesy lies in my name, and say: I have dreamed, I have dreamed.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.26: How long shall this be in the heart of the prophets that prophesy lies, and that prophesy the delusions of their own heart?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.27: Who seek to make my people forget my name through their dreams, which they tell every man to his neighbour: as their fathers forgot my name for Baal.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.28: The prophet that hath a dream, let him tell a dream: and he that hath my word, let him speak my word with truth: what hath the chaff to do with the wheat, saith the Lord?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.29: Are not my words as a fire, saith the Lord: and as a hammer that breaketh the rock in pieces?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.30: Therefore behold I am against the prophets, saith the Lord: who steal my words every one from his neighbour.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.31: Behold I am against the prophets, saith the Lord: who use their tongues, and say: The Lord saith it.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.32: Behold I am against the prophets that have lying dreams, saith the Lord: and tell them, and cause my people to err by their lying, and by their wonders: when I sent them not, nor commanded them, who have not profited this people at all, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.33: If therefore this people, or the prophet, or the priest shall ask thee, saying: What is the burden of the Lord? thou shalt say to them: You are the burden: for I will cast you away, saith the Lord.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.34: And as for the prophet, and the priest, and the people that shall say: The <u>burden of the Lord</u>: I will visit upon that man, and upon his house.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.35: Thus shall you say every one to his neighbour, and to his brother: What hath the Lord answered? and what hath the Lord spoken?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.36: And the burden of the Lord shall be mentioned no more, for every man's word shall be his burden: for you have perverted the words of the living God, of the Lord of hosts our God.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.37: Thus shalt thou say to the prophet: What hath the Lord answered thee? and what hath the Lord spoken?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.38: But if you shall say: The burden of the Lord: therefore thus saith the Lord: Because you have said this word: The burden of the Lord: and I have sent to you saying: Say not, The burden of the Lord:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.39: Therefore behold I will take you away carrying you, and will forsake you, and the city which I gave to you, and to your fathers, <u>out of my presence</u>.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__23.40: And I will bring an everlasting reproach upon you, and a perpetual shame which shall never be forgotten.
